code: export function getCartFromLS(){const lS=localStorage.getItem('cart');return lS?JSON.parse(lS):[];}export function changeTotalPrice(items){const total=items.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+item.price*item.count,0);return total;}export function removeCartItemFromLS(item){const lS=localStorage.getItem('cart');return lS?JSON.parse(lS):[];}
